title: Bloomberg Markets: Barinka on Whether Time Was Right for Snap
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Barinka on Whether Time Was Right for Snap
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Alex Barinka IPO Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing her weekly IPO Hot Sheet Report and Snap losing about a fourth of the company's market value after its first earnings report disappointed last week.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
